Class SpatialValidator

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial.SpatialValidator
public final class SpatialValidator extends Object
Internal validation utility for spatial projection consistency.

    • getCalculatedPrecisionAudit

      public static double[] getCalculatedPrecisionAudit(SpatialProjector projector, int pointCount)
      Validates SIMD vs scalar precision and returns max absolute deltas.
      Parameters:
      projector - projector under test
      pointCount - number of points to test
      Returns:
      {maxDeltaX, maxDeltaY}
